title: WTB: T206 M Brown any pose mid grade
author: ClementeFanOh

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 M Brown any pose mid grade
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone- I'm looking to buy or trade for any mid grade T206 Mordecai Brown. Pose doesn't matter, card back doesn't matter, no preference in grader other than SGC/BVG/PSA.  Most important thing is that the card be a clean 4/5
range example. I have good trade material, or can buy, or can do a combo of cards and cash. Send me a PM and we will go from there!
